Question 43.Question: Why didnâ€™t you use GenAI for feedback on your work?
Question 43.Response: I was worried about accidentally engaging in academic misconduct (e.g. accidently being too influenced by the feedback). I also often don't have time to proofread an assessment before submitting it, knowing this I edit as I write and have never thought to use GenAI to provide feedback on small pieces of work.
